data.oai_dc:dc: Myxobacteria Collection Hans Reichenbach together with the working group "Natural Products" in the GBF, German Research Center for Biotechnology, now HZI, Helmholtz Centre for Infection Research, in Braunschweig, built up a unique collection of myxobacteria (order Myxococcales) comprising about 7000 strains.|13,979 occurrences
